text: @WhiteHouse There is no comeback you ignorant twit....The economy is failing, racism is still very much alive, Covid-19 is still a very real threat!  Only those drinking your Kool-Aid believe a comeback is underway! Such shock when they realize we are almost at depression era numbers.
